summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a rural road. Ahead, a truck carrying logs is visible. The truck is moving slowly, and a person on a bicycle appears on the right side of the road in the last frame.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, following the truck ahead at a safe distance. The vehicle is staying in its lane and adjusting its speed to match the trucks pace.
key_objects: 1) Front: A truck carrying logs, approximately 20 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Right: A person on a bicycle, approximately 5 meters away, moving forward along the side of the road.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road surrounded by trees. There are no visible pedestrians, cyclists, or other vehicles in the frames provided.
actions: The vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and direction, as there are no obstacles or other vehicles in the vicinity.
